attributes.action: Take the bang out of fire works.
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks are extremely upsetting to most pet owners. My dog for example is having fits when fireworks noises are going of for the majority of the night. I have seen horses torn to bits by barb wire fencing. Let alone the effects it must have on the country’s wildlife.
All for the sake of a human beings satisfaction which only last for a moment.
But the animals are left petrified for hours. And sometimes it causes the animals fatality.
Not except able in this day and age.
attributes.background:
Take the bang out of fire works.
Please make fireworks quiet. We do not need the noise of fire works anymore upsetting are domestic pets, farm animals and wildlife.
Make it illegal for firework manufacturers to produce noisy fireworks.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Ban the use of fireworks in residential areas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559560
